name: Zombie Kingdom (Mobile Kingdom 2)
description:
A 9-units squad turn-based combat game (The combat system originated from Orge Battles)

I have played several games that have similar squad combat, but feel none of them quite reached the potential of this system. So I try to make an implementation of my own.

Coming soon:

  • Sounds
  • Skill fx
  • Strategic decisions
  • roguelike goal

(If you don't know what Mobile Kingdom is, don't worry you don't need to. It's an inside joke about unfinished games)
